ThingDef.label: Dried OG Kush
ThingDef.description: A legendary hybrid that brings deep relaxation, mild euphoria, and pain relief, perfect for unwinding after a hard day.

ThingDef.label: Dried OG Kush (Packed)
ThingDef.description: A legendary hybrid that brings deep relaxation, mild euphoria, and pain relief, perfect for unwinding after a hard day. It is packed and ready for sell!

HediffDef.label: high on dried OG kush
HediffDef.description: Induces mild euphoria and anxiolysis through enhanced endocannabinoid signaling, reducing pain perception while slightly impairing cognitive processing.

li.label: feeling mellow
li.description: Everything feels so chill... I could sit here forever.

NeedDef.label: dried OG kush
NeedDef.description: Because of dried OG kush addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.

HediffDef.label: dried OG kush tolerance
HediffDef.description: A built-up tolerance to dried OG kush. The more severe this tolerance is, the more it takes to get the same effect.

HediffDef.label: dried OG kush addiction
HediffDef.description: A chemical addiction to dried OG kush. Long-term presence of dried OG kush has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of dried OG kush, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.

li.label: craving dried OG Kush
li.description: I feel tense... I just need a little to take the edge off.
